title: Limed queen scallops flambéed in tequila
description: For those times when you've got your mates round before you go out for a night on the tiles, serve these with flour tortillas, salsa, soured cream and guacamole. If you require a more formal affair, then serve with lemon rice and a simple rocket salad.
ingredients: 2 dozen queen scallops, trimmed and ready to cook
generous glug good-quality tequila (you can drink the rest of the bottle over dinner!)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
